<#if subsidiary.addr1?has_content >${subsidiary.addr1},</#if> <#if subsidiary.addr2?has_content >${subsidiary.addr2},</#if> <#if subsidiary.city?has_content >${subsidiary.city},</#if> <#if subsidiary.state?has_content >${subsidiary.state},</#if> <#if subsidiary.zip?has_content >${subsidiary.zip},</#if> <#if subsidiary.country?has_content >${subsidiary.country}</#if>
<#else>
<#if companyInformation.addr1?has_content >${companyInformation.addr1},</#if> <#if companyInformation.addr2?has_content >${companyInformation.addr2},</#if> <#if companyInformation.city?has_content >${companyInformation.city},</#if> <#if companyInformation.state?has_content >${companyInformation.state},</#if> <#if companyInformation.zip?has_content >${companyInformation.zip},</#if> <#if companyInformation.country?has_content >${companyInformation.country}</#if>
</#if>
P: ${subsidiary.custrecord_ss_anz_sub_phone} E: ${subsidiary.custrecord_ss_anz_sub_email} W: ${subsidiary.custrecord_ss_anz_sub_url}
<#if subsidiary.country = "Australia">ABN:</#if> <#if subsidiary.country = "New Zealand">GST:</#if> ${subsidiary.federalidnumber}
<#assign footer_msg = subsidiary.custrecord_ss_anz_sub_ftrmsg_invoice >
${footer_msg[0..*150]}
of
<#assign hdr_height = subsidiary.custrecord_ss_anz_sub_hdr_hght > <#if hdr_height == 0> <#assign hdr_height = 29> </#if>

<#if record.billaddress?length != 0 > ${record.billaddress@label}
<#if record.entity.companyname?has_content>
<#else>

${record.shipaddress} </#if>
<#if record.terms?has_content>${record.terms@label}</#if> <#if record.duedate?has_content>${record.duedate@label} </#if> <#if record.subsidiary.country == "New Zealand"> <#if record.currencysymbol != "NZD"> <#if record.currency?length != 0> ${record.currency@label} </#if> <#if record.exchangerate?has_content> ${record.exchangerate@label} </#if> </#if> </#if> <#if record.otherrefnum?length != 0>PO No.</#if> <#if record.salesrep?length != 0>${record.salesrep@label}</#if> <#if record.wip_project?length != 0>${record.wip_project@label}</#if> <#if record.shipmethod?length != 0>${record.shipmethod@label}</#if> <#if record.shipdate?length != 0> ${record.shipdate@label} </#if> <#if record.salesrep?length != 0>${record.memo@label}</#if> <#if record.linkedtrackingnumbers?has_content> Tracking No. </#if>
<#if record.terms?has_content>${record.terms}</#if> <#if record.duedate?has_content>${record.duedate}</#if> <#if record.subsidiary.country == "New Zealand"> <#if record.currencysymbol != "NZD"> <#if record.currency?length != 0> ${record.currency} </#if> <#if record.exchangerate?has_content> ${record.exchangerate} </#if> </#if> </#if> <#if record.otherrefnum?length != 0>${record.otherrefnum}</#if> <#if record.salesrep?length != 0>${record.salesrep}</#if> <#if record.wip_project?length != 0>${record.wip_project}</#if> <#if record.shipmethod?length != 0>${record.shipmethod}</#if> <#if record.shipdate?length != 0> ${record.shipdate} </#if> <#if record.salesrep?length != 0>${record.memo}</#if> <#if record.linkedtrackingnumbers?has_content> ${record.linkedtrackingnumbers} </#if>
<#if record.cseg_wip_project?has_content>Work On Hand #</#if> <#if record.custbody_f5_production_slot?has_content>Production Slot #</#if>
<#if record.terms?has_content>${record.cseg_wip_project}</#if> <#if record.duedate?has_content>${record.custbody_f5_production_slot}</#if>
<#if record.item?has_content> <#assign with_units = false> <#assign with_quantity = false> <#assign with_rate = false> <#assign with_rrp = false> <#list record.item as item> <#if (item.units?has_content) ><#assign with_units = true></#if> <#if (item.quantity?has_content) ><#assign with_quantity = true></#if> <#if (item.rate?length != 0) ><#assign with_rate = true></#if> <#if (item.custcol_f5_currency_base_price?has_content)><#assign with_rrp = true></#if> </#list>
Item
Country of Origin <#if with_quantity>Quantity</#if> <#if with_units>Units</#if>
Amount
Tax Amt Gross Amt
<#list record.item as item> <#assign final_nzd_base = "0"> <#assign final_other_currency_base = "0"> <#assign nzd_base = item.custcol_dce_baseprice_item_nzd?string> <#assign other_currency_base = item.custcol_f5_currency_base_price?string> <#assign matches_nzd_base = item.custcol_dce_baseprice_item_nzd?replace(",","")?matches("[0-9]\\d*(\\.\\d+)?")> <#assign matches_other_currency_base = item.custcol_f5_currency_base_price?replace(",","")?matches("[0-9]\\d*(\\.\\d+)?")>
<#assign final_nzd_base> <#list matches_nzd_base as result> ${result?replace("(\\r\\n)","")?replace(" ","")} </#list> </#assign>
<#assign final_other_currency_base> <#list matches_other_currency_base as result> ${result?replace("(\\r\\n)","")?replace(" ","")} </#list> </#assign>
<#assign final_nzd_base = final_nzd_base?keep_before(".")?trim> <#assign final_other_currency_base = final_other_currency_base?keep_before(".")?trim>
<#if record.currencysymbol != "NZD"> <#assign exchange_rate = record.exchangerate> <#else> <#assign exchange_rate = 1> </#if>
${item.custcol_f5_sale_itemcode}
${item.description}
${item.custcolcustcol_dce_manuf_country_inv} <#if with_quantity>${item.quantity}</#if> <#if with_units>${item.units}</#if>
${item.amount}
${item.tax1amt} ${item.grossamt}
</#list>
</#if>
${subsidiary.custrecord_ss_anz_sub_bank_details@label}: <#if record.currency="EUR">
${subsidiary.custrecord_f5_subs_eurbank} <#elseif record.currency="USD">

${subsidiary.custrecord_f5_subs_audbank} <#else>
${subsidiary.custrecord_ss_anz_sub_bank_details} </#if>

${record.discounttotal@label} ${record.discounttotal} </#if>

${record.shippingcost@label} ${record.shippingcost} </#if> </#if>
${record.total@label} ${record.currency} ${record.total}
I hereby certify this commercial invoice to be true and correct.
